Key Match Events: The Celtics got out to a hot start and looked like they were going to walk away with an easy win.
But the shorthanded Nuggets, who are without reigning MVP Nikola Jokić, played tough, hard-nosed basketball.
Boston was the better team down the stretch, and the guys in green came up with enough plays in the tail end of the fourth quarter to take control of the game and walk away with a victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics secured a 118-106 victory on the road against a tough Western Conference opponent.
Boston returns home for twin games at TD Garden over the weekend.
Others: Russell Westbrook and Jamal Murray stepped up in Jokić's absence.
The Celtics won despite being without reigning MVP Nikola Jokić.
